Key Focus Areas

Engineer at Heart

Designed and coded a custom firmware for a PIC18F microcontroller, enabling multi-touch gestures on a Newhaven TFT display. Pure hands-on engineering, from hardware to software.

Educated in AI and machine learning, I build intelligent tools and web experiences—like this portfolio—using modern AI technologies, automation, and creative coding.

Blend strategic foresight with hands-on execution to drive impactful transformations in financial systems.
